chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has a problem:
The screen has a quite clear scratch on the upper left side. Additionally, it presents different scratches all around the phone's border. They are clearly visible at more than 20cm and this does not match the excellent condition.

Thank you,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
AS
